title: 【Student Dormitory】Deposit and Claim of Luggage Services
author: 鍾佩玲
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-3890-6217
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Deposit and Claim of Luggage Services
日期： Tue, 5 Sep 2023 13:06:16 +0800

Dear All,
      In order to facilitate smooth transition upon your return for the new semester, Student Dormitory Committee Members will be available to assist you to claim your luggage starting on 2023/09/06(Wed).

1. Time for luggage claim:
  (1) 2023/09/06(Wed)：
　　15:00 - 17:00
　　19:00 - 21:00
 (2) 2023/09/07(Thu)-09/10(Sun)：
        10:00 - 12:00
        14:00 - 18:00
　    19:00 - 21:00	
 (3) 2023/09/11(Mon)-09/13(Wed)：
        19:00 - 21:00

2. Overtime luggage claim 
 Any luggage not claimed by 2023/09/17(Sun) will be gathered to a different location. 
　 
Please be reminded of the above rules for your own rights and interests. Claim your luggage where it was deposited previously by schedule. For any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at (03)890-6217.

Wishing you a happy return-to-campus day!

~ Office of Student Affairs and Life Division ~
